title: Fix dashboard JSON sort_keys for deterministic output
description: Dashboard JSON uses sort_keys=False causing non-deterministic output. Running same service.yaml twice produces different JSON (field ordering varies). Audit: 06-determinism.md. Files: src/nthlayer/dashboards/builder_sdk.py:191, src/nthlayer/dashboards/sdk_adapter.py:441. Fix: Change to sort_keys=True.
